title: Jordan Peterson, Supernatural Experiences, Jonathan Pageau with Paul Vanderklay
description:
Clip from Episode 36 with Paul Vanderklay discussing Paul Anleitner's experiences in Charismatic churches, how Jordan Peterson interprets the Bible, Jonathan Pageau, the symbolic and God, and the rise of "woke" religions.

Listen to the full conversation here:
https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-c6irj-bea95a

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel at

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg

Support Deep Talks on Patreon at:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
